Models

class api.models.Exams(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Django model which corresponds to the Exams database table. Stores information of all the exams for a semester.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
courseCode

Course code which uniquely identifies the course from all courses offered in a semester.

examDate

Date of the exam for a course in a particular semester.

examDay

Day of the week when the exam is held.

examDuration

Total duration of an exam.

examTime

Time which the exam starts.

class api.models.Mods(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Django model which corresponds to the mods database table. Stores information for all the courses.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
courseAU

Academic units granted by the course upon successfully clearing it.

courseCode

Course code which uniquely identifies the course from all courses offered in a semester.

courseIndex

Index of a course. A course can have multiple indexes.

courseName

Name of the course offered in a particular semester.

class api.models.Session(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Django model which corresponds to the Session database table. Stores information for all sessions.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
courseGroup

Course group groups a set of sessions to an index. However there are also exceptions where different groups might have similar sessions.

courseIndex

Index of the course, which is made of a combination of different sessions for a course.

courseRemarks

Contains additional remarks for the course. Typical remarks would include the weeks that there are sessions held.

courseType

The type of session which can be seminar (SEM), lecture (LEC/STUDIO), tutorial (TUT), or laboratory (LAB) sessions.

courseVenue

Venue where a particular session is held. Venues can include lecture theatre, tutorial rooms, laboratory rooms or online.

lessonDay

The day of the week where the session is held.

lessonTime

Specifies the starting time and ending time for a particular session.

class api.models.Venue(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Django model which corresponds to the Venue database table. Stores information of all the venues.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
courseVenue

Venue where a particular session is held. The venue could be tutorial rooms, lecture theatre, laboratory rooms or online.

latitude

The latitude of a particular venue.

longitude

The longitude of a particular venue.
